TopicTitle: Why can I not complete this mission?

Articles.Content: I have a mission where I have to cause some kerbals to pass out, I get them to pass out, however it does not count as the mission being completed. The only other 2 requirements is being on kerbin and having a sub-orbital trajectory. What counts as a sub-orbital trajectory? I am no where near getting into an orbit, but it doesn't count as being fulfilled.

Moved to Gameplay Questions.

In order to be considered suborital, your AP (highest point in your trajectory) has to be above 70 km.  And (it's been awhile), you may actually have to be in space for it to count.
